scripts.build:windows: composer install & npm prune & npm install & composer vendor-expose & php vendor/silverstripe/framework/cli-script.php dev/build flush=all
scripts.build:default: composer install ; npm prune ; npm install ; composer vendor-expose ; php vendor/silverstripe/framework/cli-script.php dev/build flush=all
scripts.update:windows: del npm-shrinkwrap.json & composer update & npm run build
scripts.update:default: rm npm-shrinkwrap.json ; composer update ; npm run build
